text.div:
Procedure Follow up Codes (SNOMED CT)

Procedure follow up codes: a selection of SNOMED CT codes relevant to procedure follow up.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    18949003Change of dressing (procedure)
    30549001Removal of suture (procedure)
    241031001Removal of drain (procedure)
    35963001Removal of staples (procedure)
    225164002Removal of ligature
    447346005Cardiopulmonary exercise test (procedure)
    229506003Scar tissue massage (regime/therapy)
    274441001Suction drainage (procedure)
    394725008Diabetes medication review (procedure)
    359825008Cytopathology, review of bronchioalveolar lavage specimen (procedure)
